Kudoy

Kudoy is a easily accessed, quickly executed, concise method to move from challenge to strategic resolution in 12 online steps. The process is reusable, refinable, and extensible to the largest problem. The result is a one page strategic plan graphic that captures all of the vital information associated with a vision and the strategies that will achieve it.

What is Kudoy

Kudoy targets the mid-sized enterprise, organization or division that is looking for tools to help up and coming leaders or manager to acquire vision/strategy skills. The organization should be looking for a way to grow, change, adopt or adapt to opportunities. On the flip side the organization might be in a difficult situation and need a way to battle back , determine what is the most important, measure progress early on, prevent wasteful trial and error, and get everyone aligned with a strategy.

Who Is It For?

Kudoy targets the mid-sized enterprise, organization or division leader that seeks to rapidly develop strategy. The target is a 30’s or 40’s professional, who is accountable for products, services, or manages a team of professionals with a fairly well defined context.

If the individual is a leader, the intent is to help them gain perspective or a flash of insight that helps them achieve business breakthroughs and quickly achieve control and set strategic direction.

If the individual is a manager, the intent is to give them a context in which to operate and a new paradigm to pursue.

Get in touch

Having Kudoy makes achieving your vision your reality and strategy your path.
